summary: This is a brief email from the chambers of Judge Alison J. Nathan to counsel in the case U.S. v. Maxwell, transmitting a sealed letter regarding victim attendance that was referenced in a court order. The email requests confirmation of receipt.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The Honorable Alison J. Nathan is the judge whose chambers sent this email transmitting a sealed letter to counsel in the case U.S. v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: A sealed letter regarding victim attendance in the case U.S. v. Maxwell was referenced in the Court's Order, Docket No. 344.
The letter was filed under seal and transmitted to counsel by the chambers of Judge Alison J. Nathan on October 14, 2021.
The email is a routine procedural communication from the court to counsel, requesting confirmation of receipt of the sealed filing.
